features: ❤️Mini Smartphone Unlocked 4G Network: Note, please make sure your sim card supports more than one of the frequency: 4G FDD:B1/B3/B5/B7/B8/B20(2100/1800/850/2600/900/800); 4G TDD:B39/B40(2600/1900/2300); 3G WCDMA:B1/B5/B8(2100/850/900); 2G GSM:B3/B5/B8(1800/850/900). If you do not use it as a standalone mobile phone, you can connect wifi to use it without sim card.

❤️Compact and portable: SOYES XS16 Phone with Small size: 3.52 x 1.79 x 0.45 inches, 3.0 inches display 18:9 IPS screen, 480*854 resolution. Small, high-definition smartphones. Carry around without burden, easily fit in the pocket. It is especially suitable to carry when going out for sports.

❤️Small and smart: As updated version of SOYES XS11, XS16 has Android10.0 OS, 4G network and supports dual SIM cards. 5MP rear camera and 2MP front camera. Support WIFI, Type-C charging interface, 2000mAh battery. 2 kinds of memory available RAM+ROM: 2GB+16GB; 3GB+64GB. Meet your daily needs.

❤️Attract People's Attention: SOYES XS16 such interesting and novel super small size smart phone, not only hold it in your hand is very interesting to play, the vast majority of people will ask what is this phone, but also take a look at it.

❤️As a gift for Kid: Small size, whether it is for children or girls will fall in love with this special gift. It fits into the palm of a child's hand and can be held with one hand, so you can keep in touch with your child at all times. It can be used as a student's first mobile phone. Give it to girls as a gift, so cute and loving little phone girls will absolutely love it.

❤️Want to Far away from Network: Have you ever been in such a situation, want to stay away from the phone but afraid to miss a lot of things, there is always a kind of anxiety? This phone is very suitable for you to take it when you want to escape from the crowd to stay by yourself for a while, and use more energy to feel the world you see in front of you and touch. Even though we can't completely disconnect the Internet and smartphones from our lives anymore, it's fun to experience a slower pace of life with it.

If you do not use it as a standalone mobile phone, you can connect wifi to use it without sim card. Description: With the development of the Internet and the popularity of smart phones, we now receive dozens of times more information every day than before, but how much effective information do you really use? I don't know if you have such a situation, want to stay away from the phone but afraid of missing a lot of things, there is always a kind of anxiety about gain and loss? In fact, most of the time, we are emotionally unable to let go, and when we are determined to only take this mobile phone out, we find that there are not so many people looking for you, and some information is missed without much impact, and urgent things will naturally call you. This phone is perfect for when you want to escape the crowd for a while by yourself, and use more energy to feel the world you see and touch. Even though we can no longer completely disconnect from the Internet, smartphones and life, but occasionally with him to experience the slow pace of life is also very fun, may wish to give it a try. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After turning it off and on once everything came up Chinese and there was no way to get it back to English. Piece of junk if u ask me. Won’t even turn back on!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: That is good for toy. Almost all things are OK, Good battery life but terrible sound quality.Anyway, overall, this phone is nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got it for my daughter and she loved it but when she got it she had issues with using it and she had to go to T mobile and they told her and me that thphone had problems so she really can't use it because I had no Internet out side of the house .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Slow but no complaint
reviews.reviewText: It's amazing what this little device can do and I tried making calls & texts without any problems and was able to create & login to my new google account using this little device and was able to install google apps and run them without any problems and yes the device is slow but people shouldn't complain and think what you paid for this little device and don't try to compare it to a high end smartphone because that's just not going to happen because it's like trying to compare apples to oranges

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Soyes xs16 mini
reviews.reviewText: Won't work on USA network. Tried changing the APN no luck. Straight talk said it was compatible but will not work and the IMEI number is for a completely different phone from 2014. Says it's an advan S5J.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t work in the USA.
reviews.reviewText: The description states that it’s unlocked and working in every country but it doesn’t work in the USA. Wherever I take it with me, it doesn’t work. No SIM card works with the phone either. How can I fix this?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very slow reponse or no response at times.
reviews.reviewText: I don't want to keep it anymore or replace it with the same. Or return it with a full refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Although it's a cute little thing to have, I've tried four different providers, and they cannot connect to the service
